bill_title: increase the penalty for persons under the age of twenty-one to illegally purchase, attempt to purchase, possess, or consume alcoholic beverages.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to increase the penalty for persons under the age of twenty- one to illegally purchase, attempt to purchase, possess, or consume alcoholic beverages. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 35-9-2 be amended to read as follows: 35-9-2. It is a Class 2 Class 1 misdemeanor for any person under the age of twenty-one years to purchase, attempt to purchase , or possess or consume alcoholic beverages except when if consumed in a religious ceremony and given to said the person by an authorized person , or . It is a Class 1 misdemeanor for any person under the age of twenty-one years to misrepresent his the person's age with the use of any document for the purpose of purchasing or attempting to purchase alcoholic beverages from any licensee licensed under this title. 500 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.021 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to increase the penalty for persons under the age of twenty- one to illegally purchase, attempt to purchase, possess, or consume alcoholic beverages. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 35-9-2 be amended to read as follows: 35-9-2. It is a Class 2 Class 1 misdemeanor for any person under the age of twenty-one years , but over the age of seventeen years, to purchase, attempt to purchase , or possess or consume alcoholic beverages except when if consumed in a religious ceremony and given to said the person by an authorized person , or . It is a Class 1 misdemeanor for any person under the age of twenty-one years, but over the age of seventeen years, to misrepresent his the person's age with the use of any document for the purpose of purchasing or attempting to purchase alcoholic beverages from any licensee licensed under this title. Section 2. That chapter 35-9 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: It is a Class 2 misdemeanor for any person under the age of eighteen years to purchase, attempt to purchase, or possess or consume alcoholic beverages except if consumed in a religious ceremony and given to the person by an authorized person. It is a Class 2 misdemeanor for any person under the age of eighteen years to misrepresent the person's age with the use of any document for the purpose of purchasing or attempting to purchase alcoholic beverages from any licensee licensed under this title. BILL HISTORY 1/19/00 First read in House and referred to Judiciary. H.J. 130 1/28/00 Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date. 1/28/00 Judiciary Do Pass Amended, Passed, AYES 10, NAYS 1. H.J. 285
